name: A Slimes' Adventure
description:
DO YOU LIKE DYING? DYING ALOT?!?! GREAT! THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU!

You are a Slime named Bob on a dungeon crawling adventure. Traverse through the gruelingly (Not so difficult) difficult levels that test both your ability to manoeuvre around traps and your patience.  Use the mouse to select a level.

In the comments below tell me your total number of deaths by the level you reached (More levels being added so deaths are up to certain levels)

KEYBOARD and XBOX CONTROLLER support.

Keyboard:
WASD: Movement.
Spacebar: Jump.
Mouse: Select Level.

Controller:
Left Stick: Movement.
A: Jump.

Sound Effects and Music Tracks by Thomas Harding
https://soundcloud.com/marm8?fbclid=IwAR320zIF1-2USt4DiJ0X3XWL_3gIFEsfR2FGQGv3NW...

This game is a work in progress. I plan on updating it regularly and I wish to make this a lot larger than it currently is now. I am open to suggestions, recommendations and constructive criticism. 

Any bugs you find, message in the comment section below to be noticed.
